trans-unit.source: Represents a SharePoint package manifest.
trans-unit.target: 表示 SharePoint 包清单。

trans-unit.source: Gets the packages on which the activation of the current package depends.
trans-unit.target: 获取激活当前包所依赖的包。

trans-unit.source: A collection representing packages.
trans-unit.target: 一个表示包的集合。

trans-unit.source: Gets the application resource files associated with the package.
trans-unit.target: 获取与包相关联的应用程序资源文件。

trans-unit.source: A collection representing application resource files.
trans-unit.target: 一个表示应用程序资源文件的集合。

trans-unit.source: Gets the assemblies associated with the package.
trans-unit.target: 获取与包相关联的程序集。

trans-unit.source: A collection representing assemblies.
trans-unit.target: 一个表示程序集的集合。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the type of server that hosts the package.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置承载包的服务器类型。

trans-unit.source: An object representing the type of server hosting the package.
trans-unit.target: 表示托管包服务器的类型的对象。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the package description.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置包说明。

trans-unit.source: A string representing the package description.
trans-unit.target: 表示包说明的字符串。

trans-unit.source: Gets the Web part (.dwp) files associated with the package.
trans-unit.target: 获取与包相关联的 Web 部件 (.dwp) 文件。

trans-unit.source: A collection representing Web part files.
trans-unit.target: 一个表示 Web 部件文件的集合。

trans-unit.source: Gets the feature manifests associated with the package.
trans-unit.target: 获取与包相关联的功能清单。

trans-unit.source: A collection representing feature manifests.
trans-unit.target: 一个表示功能清单集合。

trans-unit.source: Gets the code access security (CAS) policies for the package.
trans-unit.target: 获取包适用的代码访问安全性 (CAS) 策略。

trans-unit.source: A collection representing CAS policies.
trans-unit.target: 一个表示 CAS 策略的集合。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets whether IIS is restarted after installing the package.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置是否在安装包后重新启动 IIS。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="True" /> if the Web server is reset; <see langword="false" /> otherwise.
trans-unit.target: <see langword="True" /> 如果重置 Web 服务器;<see langword="false" />否则为。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets how IIS is restarted after upgrading the package.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置在升级包后重新启动 IIS 的方式。

trans-unit.source: An object representing how the Web server is restarted after upgrading.
trans-unit.target: 升级后重新启动 Web 服务器的方式表示的对象。

trans-unit.source: Gets the resource files associated with the package.
trans-unit.target: 获取与包相关联的资源文件。

trans-unit.source: A collection representing resource files.
trans-unit.target: 一个表示资源文件的集合。

trans-unit.source: Gets the root files associated with the package.
trans-unit.target: 获取与包相关联的根文件。

trans-unit.source: A collection representing root files.
trans-unit.target: 一个表示根文件集合。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the version of SharePoint that the solution is designed for.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置解决方案专门针对的 SharePoint 版本。

trans-unit.source: A string value representing a version number.
trans-unit.target: 表示版本号的字符串值。

trans-unit.source: SharePoint uses this attribute to determine the version of SharePoint the solution is designed for.
trans-unit.target: SharePoint 使用此属性来确定该解决方案专用于 SharePoint 的版本。

trans-unit.source: The two current valid values are 12.0 and 14.0.
trans-unit.target: 两个当前有效的值为 12.0 和 14.0。

trans-unit.source: A value of 12.0 indicates that the item is designed for [!INCLUDE[winshare3](~/includes/winshare3-md.md)] or [!INCLUDE[offshare7](~/includes/offshare7-md.md)], while 14.0 indicates that the item is designed for [!INCLUDE[wss_14_short](~/includes/wss-14-short-md.md)] or [!INCLUDE[moss_14_short](~/includes/moss-14-short-md.md)].
trans-unit.target: 值 12.0 指示该项专为[!INCLUDE[winshare3](~/includes/winshare3-md.md)]或[!INCLUDE[offshare7](~/includes/offshare7-md.md)]，而 14.0 指示该项专为[!INCLUDE[wss_14_short](~/includes/wss-14-short-md.md)]或[!INCLUDE[moss_14_short](~/includes/moss-14-short-md.md)]。

trans-unit.source: For more information, see [Importing Items from an Existing SharePoint Site](/visualstudio/sharepoint/importing-items-from-an-existing-sharepoint-site.md).
trans-unit.target: 有关详细信息，请参阅[从现有的 SharePoint 网站导入项](/visualstudio/sharepoint/importing-items-from-an-existing-sharepoint-site.md)。

trans-unit.source: Gets the site definition manifest files associated with the package.
trans-unit.target: 获取与包相关联的站点定义清单文件。

trans-unit.source: A collection representing site definition manifest files.
trans-unit.target: 集合表示站点定义清单文件。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the package ID.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置包 ID。

trans-unit.source: A GUID value representing the package ID.
trans-unit.target: 一个 GUID 值，表示包 id。

trans-unit.source: Gets the template files associated with the package.
trans-unit.target: 获取与包相关联的模板文件。

trans-unit.source: A collection representing template files.
trans-unit.target: 一个表示模板文件的集合。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the package title.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置包标题。

trans-unit.source: A string representing the package title.
trans-unit.target: 表示包标题的字符串。
